mapper.select: select * from employee where id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from employee where id = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update employee set password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update stock set notifytimes=notifytimes+1 where stockno = #{stockno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

postion,

#{stockno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update stock set stockno=NULL, remark=NULL, acceptid=NULL, sendid=NULL, type=NULL, accepttime=NULL where stockno =#{stockno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select * from request_main where requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} and requeststatus != '0' and requeststatus != '7'

mapper.update:
update request_logistics
requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logisticsno = #{logisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
packlength = #{packlength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
packwidth = #{packwidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, packheight = #{packheight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createby = #{createby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: id, usercode, registerdate, title, remark, birthday, documenttype, documentcode, password, rate, name, delflag, defaultmail, defaulttel, defaultmobile
mapper.select:
SELECT r.requestcode,r.receiver,r.mobile AS receivermobile,r.customer,r.usercode,r.zip,r.totalevaluate,e.`name`, CONCAT(ExtractValue(c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']"),ExtractValue(p.name, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']"), ExtractValue(ct.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']"),ExtractValue(d.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']"),r.address) AS address, ExtractValue(ct.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as city, ct.code as areaCode, r.sendtype,r.totalinsurance FROM request_main r , employee e ,sys_country c ,sys_province p ,sys_city ct , sys_district d
WHERE r.requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND e.id = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r.country = c.id AND r.province = p.id AND r.city = ct.id AND r.area = d.id
SELECT internalstates FROM request_main WHERE requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

from employee_role
